price: 42. Waxaana uga abuurnay wax caynkeed ah waxay fuulaan.
arabic: وَخَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثۡلِهِۦ مَا يَرۡكَبُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakhalaqnā lahum min mith'lihi mā yarkabūna
